problem_text_cn: 如图,⊙O的半径为OA=5,以A为圆心,OA为半径的弧交⊙O于B,C两点,则弦BC等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of ⊙O is OA = N_0, and the arc with A as the center and OA as the radius intersects ⊙O at the two points B and C, then the length of the chord BC is equal to ()
raw_answer: 【解答】解:连接AB,OB,∵⊙O的半径为OA=5,以A为圆心,OA为半径的弧交⊙O于B,C两点,∴OA=AB=OB,BC⊥OA,∴∠BOA=60°,∵BC⊥OA,∴BC=5√{3}．
raw_comment: 本题主要考查垂径定理,勾股定理,等边三角形的判定与性质,关键在于推出OA=AB=OB,BC⊥OA,然后正确的特殊角的三角函数值,即可推出结论．
